entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
